avoid_review_page.label: Avoid Review Page
avoid_review_page.tooltip: This option allow customer to avoid review page when all information is provided from PayPal website.

paypal_plus.label: PayPal Plus (Checkout Transparente)
paypal_plus.comment: Use a transparent solution and your customer no longer need to leave your store to make a payment.

checkout_payment_info.label: Checkout (Review Método Pagamento)
checkout_payment_info.comment:
Além de elementos HTML, utilize os seguintes elementos para obter informações referente a transação:
{parcela_qtde}: retorna a quantidade de parcelas;
{parcela_valor}: retorna o valor da parcela.

paypalbrasil_url_ipn.label: URL de IPN
paypalbrasil_url_ipn.tooltip:
A URL de IPN deverá ser configurada em sua conta PayPal para poder receber as notificações de pagamentos, revisões e reversões por fraude.
Substituir {store_url} pela URL da loja, exemplo: https://www.exemplo.com.br/paypal/ipn

incontext.label: Express Checkout In-Context
incontext.comment: Use a in-Context solution only when Express Checkout is Active.

enable.label: Enable this Solution
enable.comment: Enable only if Express Checkout were configured.

merchantid.label: Merchant ID
merchantid.comment: This input has a MerchantId of Express Checkout Account.

login_ec.label: Express Checkout Login
login_ec.comment: Use the Express Checkout solution to facilitate user login and accelerate the purchase.

enable.label: Enable this Solution
enable.comment: Enable only if Express Checkout were configured.
enable.tooltip: For users who have itens on the shopping cart, it will be display a fast purchase button on the login and onboarding page where the user will be able to purchase with his PayPal account without the need to have an account on the store.

heading_Login.label: Warning! This solution will only work if the e-commerce accepts guest payments.

paypal_invoice.label: Invoice
paypal_invoice.comment: Use a Invoice solution to create accounts in a backend.
